up a little bit.

Do you feel that there are,
you mentioned millennials,

do you feel that there are

is millennials are

2518.28.text:
So I have three kids,

I think millennials are
just like our parents

and our grandparents and

in terms of their

What I think has changed

2544.19.text:
In the United States,
when I was growing up,

The average family size in

2555.35.text: I grew up in a family of four.

2558.08.text:
I couldn't wait to

So I would have put up
